 1790: invalid_keyfile() ->
 1791:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid key file"}].
 1792: invalid_keyfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1793:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1794:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1795:     BadKeyFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1796: 			      "badkey.pem"]),
 1797:     BadOpts = [{keyfile, BadKeyFile}| proplists:delete(keyfile, ServerOpts)],
 1798:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1799: 
 1800:     Server = 
 1801: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1802: 					 {from, self()},
 1803: 			    {options, BadOpts}]),
 1804: 
 1805:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1806: 
 1807:     Client =
 1808: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 1809: 			    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 1810: 			    {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1811: 
 1812:     File = proplists:get_value(keyfile,BadOpts),    
 1813:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server,
 1814:                               {error,{options, {keyfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, Client,
 1815:                               {error, closed}).
 1816: 
 1817: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1818: honor_server_cipher_order() ->
 1819:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1820: honor_server_cipher_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1821:      ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1822:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc, 
 1823:                        mac => sha,
 1824:                        prf => default_prf}, 
 1825:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1826:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc, 
 1827:                        mac => sha,
 1828:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1829:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1830:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,   
 1831:                        mac =>sha,
 1832:                        prf => default_prf},
 1833:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1834:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc, 
 1835:                        mac => sha,
 1836:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1837:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 1838:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1839:                                         cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 1840:                                         mac => sha,
 1841:                                         prf => default_prf}).
 1842: 
 1843: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1844: honor_client_cipher_order() ->
 1845:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1846: honor_client_cipher_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1847:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1848:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc, 
 1849:                        mac => sha,
 1850:                        prf => default_prf}, 
 1851:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1852:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc, 
 1853:                        mac => sha,
 1854:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1855:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1856:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,   
 1857:                        mac =>sha,
 1858:                        prf => default_prf},
 1859:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1860:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc, 
 1861:                        mac => sha,
 1862:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1863:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers,
 1864:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1865:                                         cipher => aes_128_cbc,
 1866:                                         mac => sha,
 1867:                                         prf => default_prf}).
 1868: 
 1869: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1870: ipv6() ->
 1871:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
 1872:      {doc,"Test ipv6."}].
 1873: ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1874:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
 1875:     
 1876:     case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts)) of
 1877: 	true ->
 1878: 	    ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1879: 	    ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1880: 	    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = 
 1881: 		ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config, ipv6),
 1882: 	    Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1883: 				   {port, 0}, {from, self()}, 
 1884: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1885: 				   {options,  
 1886: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1887: 	    Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server), 
 1888: 	    Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
 1889: 				   {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 1890: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1891: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1892: 				   {options, 
 1893: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1894: 	    
 1895: 	    ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1896: 	    
 1897: 	    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1898: 	    
 1899: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1900: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Client);
 1901: 	false ->
 1902: 	    {skip, "Host does not support IPv6"}
 1903:     end.
 1904: 
 1905: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1906: der_input() ->
 1907:     [{doc,"Test to input certs and key as der"}].
 1908: 
 1909: der_input(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1910:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1911:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam.pem"),
 1912: 
 1913:     {status, _, _, StatusInfo} = sys:get_status(whereis(ssl_manager)),
 1914:     [_, _,_, _, Prop] = StatusInfo,
 1915:     State = ssl_test_lib:state(Prop),
 1916:     [CADb | _] = element(5, State),
 1917:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP*2), %%Make sure there is no outstanding clean cert db msg in manager
 1918:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 1919:     ?CT_LOG("Size ~p", [Size]),
 1920: 
 1921:     SeverVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1922:     {ServerCert, ServerKey, ServerCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 1923: 								       SeverVerifyOpts]),
 1924:     ClientVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1925:     {ClientCert, ClientKey, ClientCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 1926: 								       ClientVerifyOpts]),
 1927:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 1928: 		  {dh, DHParams},
 1929: 		  {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey}, {cacerts, ServerCaCerts}],
 1930:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1931: 		  {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey}, {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
 1932:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1933:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1934: 					{from, self()},
 1935: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1936: 					{options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1937:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1938:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1939: 					{host, Hostname},
 1940: 					{from, self()},
 1941: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1942: 					{options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1943: 
 1944:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1945:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1946:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 1947:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 1948:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 1949: 
 1950:     ServerOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 1951:                    {dh, DHParams},
 1952:                    {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey},
 1953:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 1954:                                || Der <- ServerCaCerts]}],
 1955:     ClientOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1956:                    {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey},
 1957:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 1958:                                || Der <- ClientCaCerts]}],
 1959:     Server1 = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1960:                                          {from, self()},
 1961:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1962:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts1]}]),
 1963:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 1964:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port1},
 1965:                                          {host, Hostname},
 1966:                                          {from, self()},
 1967:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1968:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts1]}]),
 1969: 
 1970:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, ok, Client1, ok),
 1971:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
 1972:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
 1973:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 1974:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 1975: 
 1976:     ok.
 1977: 
 1978: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1979: invalid_certfile() ->
 1980:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cert file"}].
 1981: 
 1982: invalid_certfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1983:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1984:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1985:     BadCertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1986:                                  "badcert.pem"]),
 1987:     ServerBadOpts = [{certfile, BadCertFile}| proplists:delete(certfile, ServerOpts)],
 1988:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1989: 
 1990: 
 1991:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1992:     
 1993:     Server = 
 1994: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1995: 					 {from, self()},
 1996: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 1997: 
 1998:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1999: 
 2000:     Client =
 2001: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2002: 					 {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 2003: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2004: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2005:     File = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2006:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, {error,{options, {certfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, 
 2007: 			      Client, {error, closed}).
 2008:     
 2009: 
 2010: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2011: invalid_cacertfile() ->
 2012:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cacert file"}].
 2013: 
 2014: invalid_cacertfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2015:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2016:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2017:     BadCACertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 2018:                                  "badcacert.pem"]),
 2019:     ServerBadOpts = [{cacertfile, BadCACertFile}| proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts)],
 2020:     
 2021:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2022: 
 2023:     Server0  = 
 2024: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2025: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2026: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 2027: 
 2028:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 2029:     
 2030: 
 2031:     Client0 =
 2032: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2033: 					 {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 2034: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2035: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2036: 
 2037:     File0 = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2038:     
 2039:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File0,{error,enoent}}}},
 2040: 			      Client0, {error, closed}),
 2041:     
 2042:     File = File0 ++ "do_not_exit.pem",
 2043:     ServerBadOpts1 = [{cacertfile, File}|proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts)],
 2044:             
 2045:     Server1  = 
 2046: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2047: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2048: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts1}]),
 2049: 
 2050:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 2051:     
 2052:     Client1 =
 2053: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2054: 					 {port, Port1}, {host, Hostname},
 2055: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2056: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2057: 
 2058: 
 2059:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File,{error,enoent}}}},
 2060: 			      Client1, {error, closed}),
 2061:     ok.
 2062: 
 2063: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2064: new_options_in_handshake() ->
 2065:     [{doc,"Test that you can set ssl options in handshake/3 and not only in tcp upgrade"}].
 2066: new_options_in_handshake(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2067:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2068:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2069:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 2070:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2071: 
 2072:     Ciphers = [_, Cipher | _] = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version), 
 2073:                                                          [{key_exchange,
 2074:                                                  fun(dhe_rsa) ->
 2075:                                                          true;
 2076:                                                     (ecdhe_rsa) ->
 2077:                                                          true;
 2078:                                                     (rsa) ->
 2079:                                                          false;
 2080:                                                     (_) ->
 2081:                                                          false
 2082:                                                  end
 2083:                                                 }]),
 2084:     
 2085:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2086: 					{from, self()}, 
 2087: 					{ssl_extra_opts, [{versions, [Version]},
 2088: 							  {ciphers,[Cipher]}]}, %% To be set in handshake/3
 2089: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2090: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
 2091:     
 2092:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2093:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 2094: 					{host, Hostname},
 2095: 					{from, self()}, 
 2096: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2097: 					{options, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2098:     
 2099:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 2100: 
 2101:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Cipher}},
 2102:    
 2103:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 2104:     
 2105:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2106:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 2107: 
 2108: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2109: max_handshake_size() ->
 2110:     [{doc,"Test that we can set max_handshake_size to max value."}].
 2111: 
 2112: max_handshake_size(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2113:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2114:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),  
 2115: 
 2116:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2117:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2118: 					{from, self()}, 
 2119: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2120: 					{options,  [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} |ServerOpts]}]),
 2121:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2122:     
 2123:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 2124: 					{host, Hostname},
 2125: 					{from, self()}, 
 2126: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2127: 					{options, [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2128:  
 2129:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 2130:   
 2131: 
 2132: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2133: options_not_proplist() ->
 2134:     [{doc,"Test what happens if an option is not a key value tuple"}].
 2135: 
 2136: options_not_proplist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2137:     BadOption =  {client_preferred_next_protocols, 
 2138: 		  client, [<<"spdy/3">>,<<"http/1.1">>], <<"http/1.1">>},
 2139:     {error, {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, BadOption}}} =
 2140: 	ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443, [binary, {active, false}, 
 2141: 					 BadOption]).
 2142: 
 2143: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2144: invalid_options() ->
 2145:     [{doc,"Test what happens when we give invalid options"}].
 2146:        
 2147: invalid_options(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2148:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2149:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2150:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2151:     
 2152:     Check = fun(Client, Server, {versions, [sslv2, sslv3]} = Option) ->
 2153: 		    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, 
 2154: 					      {error, {options, {sslv2, Option}}}, 
 2155: 					      Client,
 2156: 					      {error, {options, {sslv2, Option}}});
 2157: 	       (Client, Server, Option) ->
 2158: 		    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, 
 2159: 					      {error, {options, Option}}, 
 2160: 					      Client,
 2161: 					      {error, {options, Option}})
 2162: 	    end,
 2163: 
 2164:     TestOpts = 
 2165:          [{versions, [sslv2, sslv3]}, 
 2166:           {verify_fun, function},
 2167:           {fail_if_no_peer_cert, 0}, 
 2168:           {depth, four}, 
 2169:           {certfile, 'cert.pem'}, 
 2170:           {keyfile,'key.pem' }, 
 2171:           {password, foo},
 2172:           {cacertfile, ""}, 
 2173:           {ciphers, [{foo, bar, sha, ignore}]},
 2174:           {reuse_session, foo},
 2175:           {reuse_sessions, 0},
 2176:           {renegotiate_at, "10"},
 2177:           {mode, depech},
 2178:           {packet, 8.0},
 2179:           {packet_size, "2"},
 2180:           {header, a},
 2181:           {active, trice},
 2182:           {key, 'key.pem' }],
 2183: 
 2184:     TestOpts2 =
 2185:         [{[{supported_groups, []}, {versions, [tlsv1]}],
 2186:           {options,incompatible,[supported_groups,{versions,['tlsv1']}]}}],
 2187: 
 2188:     [begin
 2189: 	 Server =
 2190: 	     ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 2191: 					{from, self()},
 2192: 					{options, ServerOpts ++ [TestOpt]}]),
 2193: 	 %% Will never reach a point where port is used.
 2194: 	 Client =
 2195: 	     ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
 2196: 					      {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 2197: 					      {options, ClientOpts ++ [TestOpt]}]),
 2198: 	 Check(Client, Server, TestOpt),
 2199: 	 ok
 2200:      end || TestOpt <- TestOpts],
 2201: 
 2202:     [begin
 2203:          start_client_negative(Config, TestOpt, ErrorMsg),
 2204:          ok
 2205:      end || {TestOpt, ErrorMsg} <- TestOpts2],
 2206:     ok.
 2207: 
 2208: options_whitebox() ->
 2209:     [{doc,"Whitebox tests of option handling"}].
 2210: 
 2211: 
 2212: customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host) ->
 2213:     %% In many options test scenarios we do not care about verifcation options
 2214:     %% but the client now requiers verification options by default.
 2215:     DefOpts = case Role of
 2216:                   client ->
 2217:                       case proplists:get_value(verify, Opts, undefined) of
 2218:                           undefined -> [{verify, verify_none}];
 2219:                           _ -> []
 2220:                       end;
 2221:                   server ->
 2222:                       Ciphers = proplists:get_value(ciphers, Opts, undefined),
 2223:                       Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, Opts, undefined),
 2224:                       Key = proplists:get_value(key, Opts, undefined),
 2225:                       CertsKeys = proplists:get_value(certs_keys, Opts, undefined),
 2226:                       NoCertOrKeys = Cert == undefined orelse Key == undefined andalso
 2227:                           CertsKeys == undefined,
 2228:                       if Ciphers == undefined andalso NoCertOrKeys ->
 2229:                               [{certs_keys, [#{cert => <<>>, key => {rsa, <<>>}}]}];
 2230:                          true ->
 2231:                               []
 2232:                       end
 2233:               end,
 2234:     NoVerify = case Role of
 2235:                    client -> [{verify, verify_none}|DefOpts];
 2236:                    server -> DefOpts
 2237:                end,
 2238:     case proplists:get_value(protocol, Opts, tls) of
 2239:         dtls ->
 2240:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options([{protocol, dtls}|NoVerify], Role, Host),
 2241:             {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts};
 2242:         tls ->
 2243:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options(NoVerify, Role, Host),
 2244:             case proplists:get_value(versions, Opts) of
 2245:                 undefined ->
 2246:                     {DOpts, DefOpts ++ [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|Opts]};
 2247:                 _ ->
 2248:                     {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts}
 2249:             end;
 2250:         _ ->
 2251:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options(NoVerify, Role, Host),
 2252:             {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts}
 2253:     end.
 2254: 
 2255: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role), ?OK(EXP,Opts, Role, [])).
 2256: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role, ShouldBeMissing),
 2257:         fun() ->
 2258:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2259:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2260:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2261:                     {ok, #config{ssl=EXP = __ALL}} ->
 2262:                         ShouldBeMissing = ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL);
 2263:                     Other ->
 2264:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2265:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2266:                 catch
 2267:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2268:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2269:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2270:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2271:                 end,
 2272:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2273:                     EXP = __ALL2 ->
 2274:                         ShouldBeMissing = ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL2);
 2275:                     Other2 ->
 2276:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2277:                                "ssl:update_options(~w,~w, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2278:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2279:                         error({unexpected2, Other2})
 2280:                 catch
 2281:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2282:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2283:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2284:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2285:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2286:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2, ST2})
 2287:                 end
 2288:         end()).
 2289: 
 2290: -define(ERR(EXP, Opts, Role),
 2291:         fun() ->
 2292:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2293:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2294:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2295:                     Other ->
 2296:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2297:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2298:                 catch
 2299:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2300:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2301:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2302:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2303:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2304:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2305:                 end,
 2306:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2307:                     Other2 ->
 2308:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2309:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2310:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2311:                         error({unexpected, Other2})
 2312:                 catch
 2313:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2314:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2315:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2316:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2317:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2318:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2319:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2320:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2,ST2})
 2321:                 end
 2322:         end()).
 2323: 
 2324: -define(ERR_UPD(EXP, Opts, Role),
 2325:         fun() ->
 2326:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2327:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2328:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2329:                     {ok, #config{}} ->
 2330:                         ok;
 2331:                     Other ->
 2332:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2333:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2334:                 catch
 2335:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2336:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2337:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2338:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2339:                 end,
 2340:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2341:                     Other2 ->
 2342:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2343:                                 "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2344:                                 [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2345:                         error({unexpected, Other2})
 2346:                 catch
 2347:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2348:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2349:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2350:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2351:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2352:                                 "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2353:                                 [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2354:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2,ST2})
 2355:                 end
 2356:         end()).
 2357: 
 2358: 
 2359: options_whitebox(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2360:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2361:     true = is_binary(Cert),
 2362:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_peer},  %% Check Option order last wins
 2363:         [{verify, verify_none}, {verify,verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client),
 2364:     options_protocol(Config),
 2365:     options_version(Config),
 2366:     options_alpn(Config),
 2367:     options_anti_replay(Config),
 2368:     options_beast_mitigation(Config),
 2369:     options_cacerts(Config),
 2370:     options_cert(Config),
 2371:     options_certificate_authorities(Config),
 2372:     options_ciphers(Config),
 2373:     options_client_renegotiation(Config),
 2374:     options_cookie(Config),
 2375:     options_crl(Config),
 2376:     options_hostname_check(Config),
 2377:     options_dh(Config),
 2378:     options_early_data(Config),
 2379:     options_eccs(Config),
 2380:     options_verify(Config),
 2381:     options_fallback(Config),
 2382:     options_handshake(Config),
 2383:     options_process(Config),
 2384:     options_honor(Config),
 2385:     options_debug(Config),
 2386:     options_renegotiate(Config),
 2387:     options_middlebox(Config),
 2388:     options_frag_len(Config),
 2389:     options_stapling(Config),
 2390:     options_padding(Config),
 2391:     options_identity(Config),
 2392:     options_reuse_session(Config),
 2393:     options_sni(Config),
 2394:     options_sign_alg(Config),
 2395:     options_supported_groups(Config),
 2396:     options_use_srtp(Config),
 2397:     ok.
 2398: 
 2399: options_protocol(_Config) ->
 2400:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [], client),
 2401:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [{protocol, tls}], client),
 2402:     ?OK(#{protocol := dtls}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2403: 
 2404:     %% Errors
 2405:     ?ERR({protocol, foo}, [{protocol, 'foo'}], client),
 2406: 
 2407:     begin %% erl_dist
 2408:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [erl_dist]),
 2409:         ?OK(#{}, [{erl_dist, false}], client, [erl_dist]),
 2410:         ?OK(#{erl_dist := true}, [{erl_dist, true}], client),
 2411:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [ktls]),
 2412:         ?OK(#{}, [{ktls, false}], client, [ktls]),
 2413:         ?OK(#{ktls := true}, [{ktls, true}], client)
 2414:     end,
 2415:     ok.
 2416: 
 2417: options_version(_Config) ->
 2418:     ?OK(#{versions := [_|_]}, [], client),  %% Hmm some machines still default only ?TLS_1_2
 2419:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2420: 
 2421:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3,?TLS_1_2,?TLS_1_1,?TLS_1_0]},
 2422:         [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2423:         client),
 2424:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3]}, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client),
 2425: 
 2426:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2,?DTLS_1_0]},
 2427:         [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}],  client),
 2428:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2429: 
 2430: 
 2431:     %% Errors
 2432:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{versions, []}], client),
 2433:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, []}], client),
 2434: 
 2435:     ?ERR({'tlsv1.4',{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}},
 2436:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}], client),
 2437:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2438:          [{versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2439: 
 2440:     ?ERR({'tlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2441:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2442:          client),
 2443:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1.3',{versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}},
 2444:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}],
 2445:          client),
 2446:     ?ERR({options,missing_version,{'tlsv1.2',_}},
 2447:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}],
 2448:          client),
 2449:     ok.
 2450: 
 2451: options_alpn(_Config) -> %% alpn & next_protocols
 2452:     Http = <<"HTTP/2">>,
 2453:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined}, [], client,
 2454:         [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2455:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined},  [], server,
 2456:         [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2457: 
 2458:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}],
 2459:         server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2460:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}],
 2461:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2462: 
 2463:     %% Note names have been swapped in client/server variants
 2464: 
 2465:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined, next_protocols_advertised := [Http]},
 2466:         [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector]),
 2467:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined, next_protocol_selector := _},
 2468:         [{client_preferred_next_protocols, {server,[Http], Http}}],
 2469:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2470: 
 2471:     %% Errors
 2472:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http, <<>>]}], server),
 2473:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}], client),
 2474:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}], server),
 2475:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}], client),
 2476:     ?ERR({option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}], client),
 2477:     ?ERR({option, client_only, alpn_advertised_protocols}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2478:     ?ERR({option, server_only, next_protocols_advertised}, [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], client),
 2479:     ?ERR({option, client_only, client_preferred_next_protocols}, [{client_preferred_next_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2480:     ok.
 2481: 
 2482: options_anti_replay(_Config) ->
 2483:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := undefined}, [], server),
 2484:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2485:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2486:         server),
 2487:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2488:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2489:         server),
 2490:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2491:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2492:         server),
 2493:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2494:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2495:         server),
 2496: 
 2497: 
 2498:     %% Errors
 2499:     ?ERR({option, server_only, anti_replay},
 2500:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, manual}],
 2501:          client),
 2502:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{anti_replay, _}, {session_tickets, disabled}]},
 2503:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}],
 2504:          server),
 2505:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2506:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2507:          server),
 2508:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2509:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2510:          server),
 2511:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2512:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2513:          server),
 2514:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2515:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2516:          server),
 2517:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2518:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2519:          server),
 2520:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2521:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2522:          server),
 2523:     ok.

 2525: options_beast_mitigation(_Config) -> %% Beast mitigation TLS-1.0 option only
 2526:     ?OK(#{beast_mitigation := one_n_minus_one}, [{versions, [tlsv1,'tlsv1.1']}], client),

 2529:         [beast_mitigation]),

 2531:         [{beast_mitigation, zero_n}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),

 2535:          [{beast_mitigation, enabled}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),

 2537:          [{beast_mitigation, disabled}], client),

 2540: options_cacerts(Config) ->  %% cacert[s]file
 2541:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2542:     File = case os:type() of
 2543:                {win32, _} -> <<"c:/tmp/foo">>;
 2544:                _ -> <<"/tmp/foo">>
 2545:            end,
 2546:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined}, [], client, [cacertfile]),
 2547:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined, cacertfile := File},
 2548:         [{cacertfile, File}], client),
 2549:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {verify, verify_peer}],
 2550:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2551:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [#cert{}]}, [{cacerts, [#cert{der=Cert, otp=dummy}]}],
 2552:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2553:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {cacertfile, "/tmp/foo"}],
 2554:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2555: 
 2556:     %% Errors
 2557:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 2558:     ?ERR({cacerts, Cert}, [{cacerts, Cert}], client),
 2559:     ?ERR({cacertfile, cert}, [{cacertfile, cert}], client),
 2560: 
 2561:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [depth]),
 2562:     ?OK(#{depth := 5}, [{depth, 5}], client),
 2563:     %% Error
 2564:     ?ERR({depth, 256}, [{depth, 256}], client),
 2565:     ?ERR({depth, not_an_int}, [{depth, not_an_int}], client),
 2566:     ok.
 2567: 
 2568: options_cert(Config) -> %% cert[file] cert_keys keys password
 2569:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2570:     Old = [cert, certfile, key, keyfile, password],
 2571:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []}, [], client, Old),
 2572:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,Cert}], client, Old),
 2573:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,[Cert]}], client, Old),
 2574:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>}]},
 2575:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], client, Old),
 2576: 
 2577:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{}]}, [{certs_keys, [#{}]}], client),
 2578: 
 2579:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := {rsa, <<>>}}]},
 2580:         [{key, {rsa, <<>>}}], client, Old),
 2581:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2582:         [{key, #{engine => foo, algorithm => foo, key_id => foo}}], client, Old),
 2583:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2584:         [{key, #{algorithm => eddsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}},
 2585:          {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client, Old),
 2586:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2587:         [{key, #{algorithm => ecdsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}}],
 2588:         client, Old),
 2589:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2590:         [{key, #{algorithm => rsa,
 2591:                   sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end,
 2592:                  encrypt_fun => fun(_,_,_) -> << "dummy encrypt">> end}},
 2593:          {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}], client, Old),
 2594:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, "foobar"}], client, Old),
 2595:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, <<"foobar">>}], client, Old),
 2596:     Pwd = fun() -> "foobar" end,
 2597:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := Pwd}]}, [{password, Pwd}], client, Old),
 2598: 
 2599:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/baz">>}]},
 2600:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}, {keyfile, "/tmp/baz"}], client, Old),
 2601: 
 2602:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{}]},
 2603:         [{cert, Cert}, {certfile, "/tmp/foo"}, {certs_keys, [#{}]}],
 2604:         client, Old),
 2605: 
 2606:     %% Errors
 2607:     ?ERR({options,incompatible,[key,{versions,['tlsv1.2']}]},
 2608:          [{key, #{algorithm => eddsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}},
 2609:           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], client),
 2610:     ?ERR({options,incompatible,[key,{versions,['tlsv1.3','tlsv1.2']}]},
 2611:          [{key, #{algorithm => rsa,
 2612:                   sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end,
 2613:                   encrypt_fun => fun(_,_,_) -> << "dummy encrypt">> end
 2614:                  }}], client),
 2615:     ?ERR({cert, #{}}, [{cert, #{}}], client),
 2616:     ?ERR({certfile, cert}, [{certfile, cert}], client),
 2617:     ?ERR({certs_keys, #{}}, [{certs_keys, #{}}], client),
 2618:     ?ERR_UPD({certs_keys, cert_and_key_required}, [{certs_keys, []}], server),
 2619:     ?ERR({keyfile, #{}}, [{keyfile, #{}}], client),
 2620:     ?ERR({key, <<>>}, [{key, <<>>}], client),
 2621:     ?ERR({password, _}, [{password, fun(Arg) -> Arg end}], client),
 2622:     ok.
 2623:

 2761:          [{early_data, enabled}], server),

 2763:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, stateless}], server),

 2794: options_verify(Config) ->  %% fail_if_no_peer_cert, verify, verify_fun, partial_chain
 2795:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2796:     {ok, #config{ssl = DefOpts = #{verify_fun := {DefVerify,_}}}} = ssl:handle_options([{verify, verify_none}], client, "dummy.host.org"),
 2797: 
 2798:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := false, verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {DefVerify, []}, partial_chain := _},
 2799:         [], server),
 2800:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2801:         [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2802:         server),
 2803:      ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2804:          [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], server),
 2805: 
 2806:     NewF3 = fun(_,_,_) -> ok end,
 2807:     NewF4 = fun(_,_,_,_) -> ok end,
 2808:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [fail_if_no_peer_cert]),
 2809:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2810:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}], client),
 2811:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2812:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2813:         server),
 2814:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF4, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2815:         [{verify_fun, {NewF4, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2816:         server),
 2817: 
 2818: 
 2819:     %% check verify_fun in update_options case
 2820:     #{verify_fun := undefined} = ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client, DefOpts),
 2821:     #{verify_fun := {NewF3, bar}} = ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]},
 2822:                                                         {verify_fun, {NewF3, bar}}],
 2823:                                                        client, DefOpts),
 2824: 
 2825:     %% Errors
 2826:     ?ERR({partial_chain, undefined}, [{partial_chain, undefined}], client),
 2827:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, verify_none}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}]},
 2828:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}], server),
 2829:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], client),
 2830:     ?ERR({option, server_only, fail_if_no_peer_cert},
 2831:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2832:          client),
 2833:     ?ERR({verify, verify}, [{verify, verify}], client),
 2834:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 2835:     ?ERR({partial_chain, not_a_fun}, [{partial_chain, not_a_fun}], client),
 2836:     ?ERR({verify_fun, not_a_fun}, [{verify_fun, not_a_fun}], client),
 2837:     ok.
 2838: 
 2839: options_fallback(_Config) ->
 2840:     ?OK(#{fallback := false}, [], client),
 2841:     ?OK(#{fallback := true}, [{fallback, true}], client),
 2842: 
 2843:     %% Errors
 2844:     ?ERR({option, client_only, fallback},  [{fallback, true}], server),
 2845:     ?ERR({fallback, []},  [{fallback, []}], client),
 2846:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [fallback, {versions, _}]},
 2847:          [{fallback, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client),
 2848:     ok.
 2849: 
 2850: options_handshake(_Config) -> %% handshake
 2851:     ?OK(#{handshake := full, max_handshake_size := 131072},
 2852:         [], client),
 2853:     ?OK(#{handshake := hello, max_handshake_size := 123800},
 2854:         [{handshake, hello}, {max_handshake_size, 123800}], client),
 2855: 
 2856: 
 2857:     %% Errors
 2858:     ?ERR({handshake, []},  [{handshake, []}], server),
 2859:     ?ERR({max_handshake_size, 8388608},  [{max_handshake_size, 8388608}], server),
 2860:     ?ERR({max_handshake_size, -1}, [{handshake, hello}, {max_handshake_size, -1}], client),
 2861:     ok.
 2862: 
 2863: options_process(_Config) -> % hibernate_after, spawn_opts
 2864:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [hibernate_after, receiver_spawn_opts, sender_spawn_opts]),
 2865:     ?OK(#{hibernate_after := 10000,
 2866:           receiver_spawn_opts := [{fullsweep_after, 500}],
 2867:           sender_spawn_opts := [{fullsweep_after, 500}]},
 2868:         [{hibernate_after, 10000},
 2869:          {receiver_spawn_opts,[{fullsweep_after, 500}]},
 2870:          {sender_spawn_opts, [{fullsweep_after, 500}]}],
 2871:         client),
 2872:     %% Errors
 2873:     ?ERR({hibernate_after, -1}, [{hibernate_after, -1}], server),
 2874:     ?ERR({receiver_spawn_opts, not_a_list}, [{receiver_spawn_opts, not_a_list}], server),
 2875:     ?ERR({sender_spawn_opts, not_a_list}, [{sender_spawn_opts, not_a_list}], server),
 2876:     ok.
 2877: 
 2878: options_honor(_Config) ->  %% honor_cipher_order & honor_ecc_order
 2879:     ?OK(#{honor_cipher_order := false, honor_ecc_order := false},
 2880:         [], server),
 2881:     ?OK(#{honor_cipher_order := true, honor_ecc_order := true},
 2882:         [{honor_cipher_order, true}, {honor_ecc_order, true}],
 2883:         server),
 2884:     %% Errors
 2885:     ?ERR({option, server_only, honor_cipher_order},
 2886:          [{honor_cipher_order, true}], client),
 2887:     ?ERR({option, server_only, honor_ecc_order},
 2888:          [{honor_ecc_order, true}], client),
 2889:     ?ERR({honor_ecc_order, foo}, [{honor_ecc_order, foo}], server),
 2890:     ok.
 2891:

 2895:         [{log_level, debug}, {keep_secrets, true}], server),
 2896:     ?OK(#{log_level := info},
 2897:         [{log_level, info}, {keep_secrets, false}], server, [keep_secrets]),
 2898: 
 2899:     %% Errors
 2900:     ?ERR({log_level, foo}, [{log_level, foo}], server),
 2901:     ?ERR({keep_secrets, foo}, [{keep_secrets, foo}], server),
 2902:     ok.

 2920:     ok.

 2952:         [{stapling, #{ocsp_nonce => true}}], client),
 2953: 
 2954:     ?OK(#{stapling := #{ocsp_nonce := false}},

 2956:

 2973: options_identity(_Config) ->  %% psk_identity  srp_identity and user_lookup_fun
 2974:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 2975:         [], client),
 2976:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := <<"foobar">>, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 2977:         [{psk_identity, "foobar"}], server),
 2978:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 2979:         [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}}], client),
 2980:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := {_, args}},
 2981:         [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, args}}], client),
 2982: 
 2983:     %% Should fail client option only
 2984:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 2985:         [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}}], server),
 2986: 
 2987:     %% Errors
 2988:     ?ERR({srp_identity, {_,_}},  %% FIXME doesn't like binary strings
 2989:          [{srp_identity, {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}}], client),
 2990:     ?ERR({psk_identity, _},  %% FIXME doesn't like binary strings
 2991:          [{psk_identity, <<"user">>}], client),
 2992:     ?ERR({srp_identity, _}, [{srp_identity, "user"}], client),
 2993:     ?ERR({user_lookup_fun, _},
 2994:          [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_) -> ok end, args}}],
 2995:          client),
 2996: 
 2997:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [psk_identity, _]},
 2998:          [{psk_identity, "foobar"},{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 2999:          server),
 3000:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [srp_identity, _]},
 3001:          [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}},{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3002:          client),
 3003:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [user_lookup_fun, _]},
 3004:          [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, args}}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3005:          client),
 3006:     ok.
 3007: 
 3008: options_reuse_session(_Config) ->
 3009:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := undefined, reuse_sessions := true}, [], client),
 3010:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := _, reuse_sessions := true}, [], server),
 3011: 
 3012:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := <<>>, reuse_sessions := save},
 3013:         [{reuse_session, <<>>}, {reuse_sessions, save}], client),
 3014:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := {<<>>, <<>>}, reuse_sessions := false},
 3015:         [{reuse_session, {<<>>, <<>>}}, {reuse_sessions, false}], client),
 3016: 
 3017:     RS_F = fun(_,_,_,_) -> ok end,
 3018:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := RS_F, reuse_sessions := false},
 3019:         [{reuse_session, RS_F}, {reuse_sessions, false}],
 3020:         server),
 3021: 
 3022:     %% Errors
 3023:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [reuse_session, _]},
 3024:          [{reuse_session, RS_F}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3025:          server),
 3026:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [reuse_sessions, _]},
 3027:          [{reuse_sessions, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3028:          server),
 3029:     ?ERR({reuse_session, RS_F},
 3030:          [{reuse_session, RS_F},{reuse_sessions, false}],
 3031:          client),
 3032:     ?ERR({reuse_sessions, foo},  [{reuse_sessions, foo}], server),
 3033:     ?ERR({reuse_session, foo},  [{reuse_session, foo}], server),
 3034:     ?ERR({reuse_sessions, save}, [{reuse_sessions, save}], server),
 3035:     ?ERR({reuse_session, <<>>}, [{reuse_session, <<>>}], server),
 3036: 
 3037:     ok.
 3038: 
 3039: options_sni(_Config) -> %% server_name_indication
 3040:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := "dummy.host.org"}, [], client),
 3041:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [server_name_indication]),
 3042:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := disable}, [{server_name_indication, disable}], client),
 3043:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := "dummy.org"}, [{server_name_indication, "dummy.org"}], client),
 3044: 
 3045:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := _}, [], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3046: 
 3047:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := _}, [{sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3048:     SNI_F = fun(_) -> sni end,
 3049:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := SNI_F}, [{sni_fun, SNI_F}], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3050: 
 3051:     %% Errors
 3052:     ?ERR({option, client_only, server_name_indication},
 3053:          [{server_name_indication, "dummy.org"}], server),
 3054:     ?ERR({option, server_only, sni_hosts},  [{sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], client),
 3055:     ?ERR({option, server_only, sni_fun},  [{sni_fun, SNI_F}], client),
 3056: 
 3057:     ?ERR({server_name_indication, foo},  [{server_name_indication, foo}], client),
 3058:     ?ERR({sni_hosts, foo}, [{sni_hosts, foo}], server),
 3059:     ?ERR({sni_fun, foo}, [{sni_fun, foo}], server),
 3060: 
 3061:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [sni_fun, sni_hosts]},
 3062:          [{sni_fun, SNI_F}, {sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], server),
 3063:     ok.
 3064: 
 3065: options_sign_alg(_Config) ->  %% signature_algs[_cert]
 3066:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [_|_], signature_algs_cert := undefined},
 3067:         [], client),
 3068:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,{sha512,rsa}], signature_algs_cert := undefined},
 3069:         [{signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,{sha512,rsa}]}], client),
 3070:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [_|_], signature_algs_cert := [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]},
 3071:         [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}],
 3072:         client),
 3073: 
 3074:     %% Errors
 3075:     ?ERR({signature_algs, not_a_list}, [{signature_algs, not_a_list}], client),
 3076:     ?ERR({signature_algs_cert, not_a_list}, [{signature_algs_cert, not_a_list}], client),
 3077:     ?ERR({signature_algs, [foobar]}, [{signature_algs, [foobar]}], client),
 3078:     ?ERR({signature_algs_cert, [foobar]}, [{signature_algs_cert, [foobar]}], client),
 3079:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [signature_algs_cert, {versions, _}]},
 3080:          [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}, {versions, ['tlsv1.1']}],
 3081:          client),
 3082:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [signature_algs_cert, {versions, _}]},
 3083:          [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}, {versions, ['tlsv1.1']}],
 3084:          server),
 3085:     ?ERR({options, {no_supported_algorithms, {signature_algs,[]}}},
 3086:          [{signature_algs, []}], client),
 3087:     ?ERR({options, {no_supported_signature_schemes, {signature_algs_cert,[]}}},
 3088:          [{signature_algs_cert, []}],
 3089:          client),
 3090:     ok.
 3091: 
 3092: options_supported_groups(_Config) ->
 3093:     Default = ssl:groups(default),
 3094:     ?OK(#{supported_groups := {supported_groups, Default}},
 3095:         [], client),
 3096:     ?OK(#{supported_groups := {supported_groups, [secp521r1, ffdhe2048]}},
 3097:         [{supported_groups, [secp521r1, ffdhe2048]}], client),
 3098: 
 3099:     %% ERRORs
 3100:     ?ERR({{'tlvs1.2'},{versions,[{'tlvs1.2'}]}},
 3101:          [{supported_groups, []}, {versions, [{'tlvs1.2'}]}], client),
 3102:     ?ERR({supported_groups, not_a_list}, [{supported_groups, not_a_list}], client),
 3103:     ?ERR({supported_groups, none_valid},  [{supported_groups, []}], client),
 3104:     ?ERR({supported_groups, none_valid},  [{supported_groups, [foo]}], client),
 3105:     ok.
 3106: 
 3107: options_use_srtp(_Config) ->
 3108:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3109:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3110:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3111:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3112:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3113:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3114:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3115:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3116:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], client),
 3117:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3118:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3119:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], server),
 3120: 
 3121:     %% invalid parameters
 3122:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3123:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3124:           {use_srtp, #{}}], client),
 3125:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3126:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3127:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => []}}], client),
 3128:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {invalid_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3129:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3130:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<"bad">>]}}], client),
 3131:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {unknown_parameters,[whatever]}}},
 3132:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3133:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], whatever => xxx}}], client),
 3134: 
 3135:     %% use_srtp is DTLS-only extension, by default setting its options should raise an error
 3136:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3137:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3138:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3139:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3140:     ok.
 3141: 
 3142: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3143: 
 3144: default_reject_anonymous()->
 3145:     [{doc,"Test that by default anonymous cipher suites are rejected "}].
 3146: default_reject_anonymous(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3147:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3148:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3149:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3150:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 3151:     TLSVersion = ssl_test_lib:tls_version(Version),
 3152:     
 3153:    [CipherSuite | _] = ssl_test_lib:ecdh_dh_anonymous_suites(TLSVersion),
 3154:     
 3155:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3156: 					      {from, self()},
 3157: 					      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3158:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3159:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3160:                                               {host, Hostname},
 3161:                                               {from, self()},
 3162:                                               {options,
 3163:                                                [{ciphers,[CipherSuite]} |
 3164:                                                 ClientOpts]}]),
 3165: 
 3166:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, insufficient_security).
 3167: 
 3168: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3169: cb_info() ->
 3170:     [{doc,"Test that we can set cb_info."}].
 3171: 
 3172: cb_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3173:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3174:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3175:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config, tls),
 3176:     CbInfo =
 3177:         case Protocol of
 3178:             tls ->
 3179:                 {cb_info, {gen_tcp, tcp, tcp_closed, tcp_error}};
 3180:             dtls ->
 3181:                 {cb_info, {gen_udp, udp, udp_closed, udp_error}}
 3182:         end,
 3183:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3184:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3185:                                         {from, self()},
 3186:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3187:                                         {options,  [CbInfo | ServerOpts]}]),
 3188:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3189: 
 3190:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3191:                                         {host, Hostname},
 3192:                                         {from, self()},
 3193:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3194:                                         {options, [CbInfo | ClientOpts]}]),
 3195: 
 3196:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3197: 
 3198: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3199: log_alert() ->
 3200:     [{doc,"Test that we can set log_alert and that it translates to correct log_level" 
 3201:       " that has replaced this option"}].
 3202: 
 3203: log_alert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3204:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3205:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3206: 
 3207:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3208:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3209:                                         {from, self()},
 3210:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3211:                                         {options,  [{log_alert, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3212:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3213:     {Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 3214:                                                  {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3215:                                                  {host, Hostname},
 3216:                                                  {from, self()},
 3217:                                                  {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3218:                                                  {options, [{log_alert, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3219:     
 3220:     {ok, [{log_level, none}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [log_level]),
 3221:     
 3222:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3223: 
 3224: 
 3225: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3226: %% Note that these test only test that the options are valid to set. As application data
 3227: %% is a stream you can not test that the send acctually splits it up as when it arrives
 3228: %% again at the user layer it may be concatenated. But COVER can show that the split up
 3229: %% code has been run.
 3230:    
 3231: rizzo_disabled() ->
 3232:      [{doc, "Test original beast mitigation disable option for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3233: 
 3234: rizzo_disabled(Config) ->
 3235:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3236:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3237:     
 3238:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3239: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3240: rizzo_zero_n() ->
 3241:      [{doc, "Test zero_n beast mitigation option (same affect as original disable option) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3242: 
 3243: rizzo_zero_n(Config) ->
 3244:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3245:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3246:     
 3247:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3248: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3249: rizzo_one_n_minus_one () ->
 3250:      [{doc, "Test beast_mitigation option one_n_minus_one (same affect as default) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3251: 
 3252: rizzo_one_n_minus_one (Config) ->
 3253:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one } | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3254:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3255:     
 3256:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3257:

 3260: supported_groups() ->
 3261:     [{doc,"Test the supported_groups option in TLS 1.3."}].
 3262: 
 3263: supported_groups(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3264:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3265:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3266: 
 3267:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3268: 
 3269:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3270: 					{from, self()},
 3271:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3272:                                         {options, [{supported_groups, [x448, x25519]} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3273:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3274:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3275: 					{host, Hostname},
 3276:                                         {from, self()},
 3277:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3278:                                         {options, [{supported_groups,[x448]} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3279: 
 3280:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 3281: 
 3282:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3283:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 3284:

 3286: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13() ->
 3287:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order in TLS 1.3."}].
 3288: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3289:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3290:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3291:                        mac => aead,
 3292:                        prf => sha384},
 3293:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3294:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3295:                        mac => aead,
 3296:                        prf => sha256}],
 3297:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3298:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3299:                        mac => aead,
 3300:                        prf => sha256},
 3301:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3302:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3303:                        mac => aead,
 3304:                        prf => sha384}],
 3305:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => any,
 3306:                                                                       cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3307:                                                                       mac => aead,
 3308:                                                                       prf => sha384}).

 3357:                            [early_data,{session_tickets,disabled}]}),

 3360:                                    {session_tickets, stateful},
 3361:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3362:                           {options, {session_tickets, stateful}}),
 3363: 
 3364:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3365:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3366:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3367:                           {options,incompatible,
 3368:                            [early_data, {session_tickets, manual}, {use_ticket, undefined}]}),
 3369:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3370:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3371:                                    {use_ticket, [<<"ticket">>]},
 3372:                                    {early_data, "test"}],
 3373:                           {options, {early_data, "test"}}),
 3374:     %% All options are ok but there is no server
 3375:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3376:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3377:                                    {use_ticket, [<<"ticket">>]},
 3378:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3379:                           econnrefused),
 3380: 
 3381:     %% All options are ok but there is no server
 3382:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3383:                                    {session_tickets, auto},
 3384:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3385:                           econnrefused).

 3470:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
