 3482: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3483: getstat() ->
 3484:     [{doc, "Test that you use ssl:getstat on a TLS socket"}].
 3485: 
 3486: getstat(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
 3487:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3488:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3489:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3490:     
 3491:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 3492:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(Port0, [ServerOpts]),
 3493:     {ok, _} = ssl:getstat(ListenSocket),
 3494:     ssl:close(ListenSocket),
 3495: 
 3496:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
 3497: 					{from, self()},
 3498:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3499:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3500:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3501:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
 3502: 					{host, Hostname},
 3503:                                         {from, self()},
 3504:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3505:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3506:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3507: 
 3508: invalid_options_tls13() ->
 3509:     [{doc, "Test invalid options with TLS 1.3"}].
 3510: invalid_options_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3511:     TestOpts =
 3512:         [{{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one},
 3513:           {options, incompatible,
 3514:            [beast_mitigation,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3515:           common},
 3516: 
 3517:          {{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"http/1.1">>]},
 3518:           {options, incompatible,
 3519:            [next_protocols_advertised, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3520:           server},
 3521: 
 3522:          {{client_preferred_next_protocols,
 3523:            {client, [<<"http/1.1">>]}},
 3524:           {options, incompatible,
 3525:            [client_preferred_next_protocols, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3526:           client},
 3527: 
 3528:          {{client_renegotiation, false},
 3529:           {options, incompatible,
 3530:            [client_renegotiation, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3531:           server
 3532:          },
 3533: 
 3534:          {{cookie, false},
 3535:           {option , server_only, cookie},
 3536:           client
 3537:          },
 3538: 
 3539:          {{padding_check, false},
 3540:           {options, incompatible, [padding_check,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3541:           common},
 3542: 
 3543:          {{psk_identity, "Test-User"},
 3544:           {options, incompatible, [psk_identity,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3545:           common},
 3546: 
 3547:          {{user_lookup_fun,
 3548:            {fun ssl_test_lib:user_lookup/3, <<1,2,3>>}},
 3549:           {options, incompatible, [user_lookup_fun,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3550:           common},
 3551: 
 3552:          {{reuse_session, fun(_,_,_,_) -> false end},
 3553:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3554:           server},
 3555: 
 3556:          {{reuse_session, <<1,2,3,4>>},
 3557:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3558:           client},
 3559: 
 3560:          {{reuse_sessions, true},
 3561:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_sessions, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3562:           common},
 3563: 
 3564:          {{secure_renegotiate, false},
 3565:           {options, incompatible, [secure_renegotiate, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3566:           common},
 3567: 
 3568:          {{srp_identity, {"user", "passwd"}},
 3569:           {options, incompatible, [srp_identity, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3570:           client}
 3571:         ],
 3572: 
 3573:     Fun = fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) ->
 3574:                   case Type of
 3575:                       server ->
 3576:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3577:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3578:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3579:                       client ->
 3580:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3581:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3582:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3583:                       common ->
 3584:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3585:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3586:                                                 ErrorMsg),
 3587:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3588:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3589:                                                 ErrorMsg)
 3590:                   end
 3591:           end,
 3592:     [Fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) || {Option, ErrorMsg, Type} <- TestOpts].
 3593: 
 3594: 
 3595: ssl_not_started() ->
 3596:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned if ssl is not started"}].
 3597: ssl_not_started(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3598:     application:stop(ssl),
 3599:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config, tls),
 3600:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 3601:     Opts = [{verify, verify_none},
 3602:             {versions, [Version]},
 3603:             {protocol, Protocol}],
 3604:     try
 3605:         {error, ssl_not_started} = ssl:connect("localhost", 22, Opts)
 3606:     after
 3607:         ssl:start()
 3608:     end,
 3609:     ok.
 3610: 
 3611: cookie() ->
 3612:     [{doc, "Test cookie extension in TLS 1.3"}].
 3613: cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3614:     cookie_extension(Config, true),
 3615:     cookie_extension(Config, false).
 3616: 
 3617: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3618: check_random_nonce() ->
 3619:     [{doc,"Test random nonce - expecting 32B random for TLS1.3 and 4B UTC "
 3620:       "epoch with 28B random for older version"}].
 3621: check_random_nonce(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3622:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3623:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3624:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3625:     N = 10,
 3626:     F = fun (Id) -> establish_connection(Id,ServerNode, ServerOpts,
 3627:                                          ClientNode, ClientOpts,
 3628:                                          Hostname)
 3629:         end,
 3630:     ConnectionPairs = [F(Id) || Id <- lists:seq(1, N)],
 3631:     Randoms = lists:flatten([ssl_test_lib:get_result([Server, Client]) ||
 3632:                                 {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs]),
 3633:     Deltas = [abs(FourBytes - SecsSince) ||
 3634:                  {_FromPid,
 3635:                   {_Id, {_, <<FourBytes:32, _/binary>>}, SecsSince}} <- Randoms],
 3636:     MeanDelta = lists:sum(Deltas) div N,
 3637:     case ?config(version, Config) of
 3638:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3639:             %% 4B "random" expected since TLS1.3
 3640:             RndThreshold   = 10000,
 3641:             true = MeanDelta > RndThreshold;
 3642:         _ ->
 3643:             %% 4 epoch based bytes expected pre TLS1.3
 3644:             EpochThreshold = 10,
 3645:             true = MeanDelta < EpochThreshold
 3646:     end,
 3647:     [begin
 3648:          ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3649:          ssl_test_lib:close(Client)
 3650:      end || {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs].
 3651: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3652: cipher_listing() ->
 3653:     [{doc, "Check that exclusive cipher for possible supported version adds up to all cipher " 
 3654:       "for the max version. Note that TLS-1.3 will contain two distinct sets of ciphers "
 3655:       "one for TLS-1.3 and one pre TLS-1.3"}].
 3656: cipher_listing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3657:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, tuple),
 3658:     length_exclusive(Version) == length_all(Version).
 3659: 
 3660: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3661: format_error() ->
 3662:     "".
 3663: format_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3664:     Errors = [{error, enotconn},
 3665:               {error, closed},
 3666:               {options, {keyfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3667:               {options, {certfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3668:               {options, {cacertfile, "TestFileName",{error,enoent}}},
 3669:               {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, [foo]}},
 3670:               {options, {insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3','tlsv1.1'}}},
 3671:               {options, incompatible, [{verify,verify_peer},{cacerts,undefined}]},
 3672:               {options, {protocol, foo}},
 3673:               {option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols},
 3674:               {options, {alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}},
 3675:               {options, missing_version, {'tlsv1.2',{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}}},
 3676:               {options, {no_supported_algorithms, {signature_algs,[]}}},
 3677:               {options, {no_supported_signature_schemes, {signature_algs_cert,[]}}}
 3678:              ],
 3679:     Check = fun(Err) ->
 3680:                     Str = ssl:format_error(Err),
 3681:                     io:format("~p => ~s ~n", [Err, Str]),
 3682:                     %% Verify flat string (why do ssl flatten strings?)
 3683:                     Str = [C || C <- Str, is_integer(C)]
 3684:             end,
 3685:     [Check(Err) || Err <- Errors],
 3686:     ok.
 3687: 
 3688: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3689: 
 3690: export_key_materials() ->
 3691:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5"}].
 3692: 
 3693: export_key_materials(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3694:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3695:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3696:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3697:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3698:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3699: 
 3700:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 3701: 
 3702:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3703:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3704:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3705:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3706:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3707:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3708:     Server ! get_socket,
 3709:     ServerS = receive
 3710:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3711:               end,
 3712: 
 3713:     case Version of
 3714:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3715:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3716:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3717:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [32]),
 3718:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [32]);
 3719:         _ ->
 3720:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3721:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3722:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3723:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3724:             true = ExportKeyMaterial1 =/= ExportKeyMaterial2
 3725:     end.
 3726: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3727: exporter_master_secret_consumed() ->
 3728:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5 TLS-1.3 functionality"}].
 3729: 
 3730: exporter_master_secret_consumed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3731:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3732:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3733:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3734:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3735:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3736: 
 3737:     Label1 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp1">>,
 3738:     Label2 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp2">>,
 3739:     Label3 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp3">>,
 3740:     Label4 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp4">>,
 3741: 
 3742:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3743:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3744:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3745:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3746:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3747:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3748:     Server ! get_socket,
 3749:     ServerS = receive
 3750:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3751:               end,
 3752: 
 3753:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32]),
 3754:     {error, exporter_master_secret_already_consumed} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label3], [<<>>], [32]),
 3755:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32], false),
 3756:     {error, bad_input} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label3, Label4], [<<>>], [32]).
 3757: 
 3758: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3759: 
 3760: legacy_prf() ->
 3761:     [{doc, "Test prf/5"}].
 3762: 
 3763: legacy_prf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3764:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3765:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3766:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3767:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3768:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3769: 
 3770:    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3771:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3772:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3773:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3774:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3775: 
 3776:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 3777: 
 3778:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 3779:                     [return_socket,
 3780:                      {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3781:                      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3782:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3783:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3784:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3785:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3786: 
 3787:     Server ! get_socket,
 3788:     ServerS = receive
 3789:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3790:               end,
 3791: 
 3792:     case Version of
 3793:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3794:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3795:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32);
 3796:         _ ->
 3797:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 3798:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 3799:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3800:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3801:             true = ExportKeyMaterials1 =/= ExportKeyMaterials2
 3802:     end.
 3803: 
 3804: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3805: 
 3806: establish_connection(Id, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts, Hostname) ->
 3807:     Server =
 3808:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3809:                                    {from, self()},
 3810:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 3811:                                           [Id, server_random]}},
 3812:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3813: 
 3814:     ListenPort = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3815:     Client =
 3816:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, ListenPort},
 3817:                                    {host, Hostname},
 3818:                                    {from, self()},
 3819:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 3820:                                           [Id, client_random]}},
 3821:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer} |ClientOpts]}]),
 3822: 
 3823:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 3824:     {Server, Client}.
 3825: 
 3826: %%% Checker functions
 3827: get_connection_information(Socket, ConnectionId, InfoType) ->
 3828:     {ok, [ConnectionInfo]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [InfoType]),
 3829:     {ConnectionId, ConnectionInfo, secs_since_1970()}.
 3830: secs_since_1970() ->
 3831:     calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(
 3832:         calendar:universal_time()) - 62167219200.
 3833: 
 3834: connection_information_result(Socket) ->
 3835:     {ok, Info = [_ | _]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 3836:     case  length(Info) > 3 of
 3837: 	true -> 
 3838: 	    %% At least one ssl_option() is set
 3839: 	    ?CT_LOG("Info ~p", [Info]),
 3840: 	    ok;
 3841: 	false ->
 3842: 	    ct:fail(no_ssl_options_returned)
 3843:     end.
 3844: 
 3845: secret_connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 3846:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 3847:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [client_random, server_random, master_secret]),
 3848:     check_connection_info(Protocol, ConnInfo).
 3849: 
 3850: keylog_connection_info_result(Socket, KeepSecrets) ->
 3851:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 3852:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [keylog]),
 3853:     check_keylog_info(Protocol, ConnInfo, KeepSecrets).
 3854: 
 3855: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', [{keylog, ["CLIENT_HANDSHAKE_TRAFFIC_SECRET"++_,_|_]=Keylog}], true) ->
 3856:     {ok, Keylog};
 3857: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', []=Keylog, false) ->
 3858:     {ok, Keylog};
 3859: check_keylog_info(_, [{keylog, ["CLIENT_RANDOM"++_]=Keylog}], _) ->
 3860:     {ok, Keylog};
 3861: check_keylog_info(_, Unexpected, Keep) ->
 3862:     {unexpected, Keep, Unexpected}.
 3863: 
 3864: check_srp_in_connection_information(_Socket, _Username, client) ->
 3865:     ok;
 3866: check_srp_in_connection_information(Socket, Username, server) ->
 3867:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 3868:     ?CT_LOG("Info ~p~n", [Info]),
 3869:     case proplists:get_value(srp_username, Info, not_found) of
 3870:         Username ->
 3871: 	        ok;
 3872:         not_found ->
 3873:             ct:fail(srp_username_not_found)
 3874:     end.
 3875: 
 3876: %% In TLS 1.3 the master_secret field is used to store multiple secrets from the key schedule and it is a tuple.
 3877: %% client_random and server_random are not used in the TLS 1.3 key schedule.
 3878: check_connection_info('tlsv1.3', [{client_random, ClientRand},{server_random, ServerRand},
 3879:                                   {master_secret, {master_secret, MasterSecret}}]) ->
 3880:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 3881: check_connection_info(_, [{client_random, ClientRand}, {server_random, ServerRand}, {master_secret, MasterSecret}]) ->
 3882:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 3883: check_connection_info(_, _) ->
 3884:     false.
 3885: 
 3886: try_recv_active(Socket) ->
 3887:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 3888:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 3889:     ok.
 3890: try_recv_active_once(Socket) ->
 3891:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 3892:     ok.
 3893: 
 3894: controlling_process_result(Socket, Pid, Msg) ->
 3895:     ok = ssl:controlling_process(Socket, Pid),
 3896:     %% Make sure other side has evaluated controlling_process
 3897:     %% before message is sent
 3898:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 3899:     ssl:send(Socket, Msg),
 3900:     no_result_msg.
 3901: 
 3902: controller_dies_result(_Socket, _Pid, _Msg) ->
 3903:     receive Result -> Result end.
 3904: send_recv_result_timeout_client(Socket) ->
 3905:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, not_infinity) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3906:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, -1) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3907:     try ssl:recv(Socket, not_integer, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3908:     try ssl:recv(Socket, -1, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3909:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 3910:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 0),
 3911:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 3912:     receive
 3913: 	Msg ->
 3914: 	    io:format("Msg ~p~n",[Msg])
 3915:     after 500 ->
 3916: 	    ok
 3917:     end,
 3918:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 3919:     ok.
 3920: send_recv_result_timeout_server(Socket) ->
 3921:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello"),
 3922:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 3923:     ssl:send(Socket, " world"),
 3924:     ok.
 3925: 
 3926: do_recv_close(Socket) ->
 3927:     {error, closed} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 3928:     receive
 3929: 	{_,{error,closed}} ->
 3930: 	    error_extra_close_sent_to_user_process
 3931:     after 500 ->
 3932: 	    ok
 3933:     end.
 3934: 
 3935: tls_close(Socket) ->
 3936:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send_recv_result(Socket),
 3937:     %% So both sides will have time to send
 3938:     %% and recv before close is called, as this
 3939:     %% function will be called by both client
 3940:     %% and server in the test.
 3941:     ct:sleep(100),
 3942:     case ssl:close(Socket, 10000) of
 3943:         ok ->
 3944:             ok;
 3945:         {error, closed} ->
 3946:             ok;
 3947:         Other ->
 3948:             ct:fail(Other)
 3949:     end.
 3950: 
 3951: run_error_server_close([Pid | Opts]) ->
 3952:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 3953:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 3954:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 3955:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 3956:     Pid ! ssl:close(Socket).
 3957: 
 3958: run_error_server([ Pid | Opts]) ->
 3959:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 3960:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 3961:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 3962:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 3963:     Pid ! ssl:controlling_process(Socket, self()).
 3964: 
 3965: run_client_error([Port, Opts]) ->
 3966:     ssl:connect("localhost", Port, Opts).
 3967: 
 3968: no_recv_no_active(Socket) ->
 3969:     receive
 3970:         {ssl_closed, Socket} ->
 3971:             ct:fail(received_active_msg)
 3972:     after 5000 ->
 3973:             ok
 3974:     end.
 3975: 
 3976: connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 3977:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol, selected_cipher_suite]),
 3978:     {ok, {proplists:get_value(protocol, Info), proplists:get_value(selected_cipher_suite, Info)}}.
 3979: 
 3980: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3981: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 3982: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3983: 
 3984: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1') ->
 3985:     dtls;
 3986: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1.2') ->
 3987:     dtls;
 3988: tls_or_dtls(_) ->
 3989:     tls.
 3990: 
 3991: active_n_common(S, N) ->
 3992:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-N}]),
 3993:     receive
 3994:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 3995:     after
 3996:         1000 ->
 3997:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 3998:     end,
 3999:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4000:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,0}]),
 4001:     receive
 4002:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4003:     after
 4004:         1000 ->
 4005:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 4006:     end,
 4007:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32767}]),
 4008:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,1}]),
 4009:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32769}]),
 4010:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32768}]),
 4011:     receive
 4012:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4013:     after
 4014:         1000 ->
 4015:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 4016:     end,
 4017:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4018:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 4019:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,true}]),
 4020:     [{active,true}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4021:     receive
 4022:         _ -> error({error,active_n})
 4023:     after
 4024:         0 ->
 4025:             ok
 4026:     end,
 4027:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 4028:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,once}]),
 4029:     [{active,once}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4030:     receive
 4031:         _ -> error({error,active_n})
 4032:     after
 4033:         0 ->
 4034:             ok
 4035:     end,
 4036:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32768}]),
 4037:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,false}]),
 4038:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4039:     ok.
 4040: 
 4041: ok({ok,V}) -> V.
 4042: 
 4043: repeat(N, Fun) ->
 4044:     Repeat = fun F(Arg) when is_integer(Arg), Arg > 0 -> Fun(N - Arg), F(Arg - 1);
 4045:                         F(_) -> ok end,
 4046:     Repeat(N).
 4047: 
 4048: 
 4049: get_close(Pid, Where) ->
 4050:     receive
 4051: 	{'EXIT', Pid, _Reason} ->
 4052: 	    receive
 4053: 		{_, {ssl_closed, Socket}} ->
 4054: 		    ?CT_LOG("Socket closed ~p~n",[Socket]);
 4055: 		Unexpected ->
 4056: 		    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 4057: 		    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 4058: 	    after 5000 ->
 4059: 		    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 4060: 	    end;
 4061: 	Unexpected ->
 4062: 	    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 4063: 	    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 4064:     after 5000 ->
 4065: 	    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 4066:     end.
 4067: 
 4068: ssl_active_recv(N) ->
 4069:     ssl_active_recv(N, []).
 4070: 
 4071: ssl_active_recv(0, Acc) ->
 4072:     Acc;
 4073: ssl_active_recv(N, Acc) ->
 4074:     receive 
 4075: 	{ssl, _, Bytes} ->
 4076:             ssl_active_recv(N-length(Bytes),  Acc ++ Bytes)
 4077:     end.
 4078:

 4081: honor_cipher_order(Config, Honor, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, Expected) ->
 4082:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4083:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4084: 
 4085:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4086: 
 4087:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4088: 					{from, self()},
 4089: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4090: 					{options, [{ciphers, ServerCiphers}, {honor_cipher_order, Honor}
 4091: 						   | ServerOpts]}]),
 4092:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4093:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4094: 					{host, Hostname},
 4095: 					{from, self()},
 4096: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4097: 					{options, [{ciphers, ClientCiphers}
 4098: 						   | ClientOpts]}]),
 4099: 
 4100:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 4101: 
 4102:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Expected}},
 4103: 
 4104:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 4105: 
 4106:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4107:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4108: 
 4109: cookie_extension(Config, Cookie) ->
 4110:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4111:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4112:     Data = "123456789012345",  %% 15 bytes
 4113: 
 4114:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4115: 
 4116:     %% Trigger a HelloRetryRequest
 4117:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4118: 					{from, self()},
 4119: 					{options, [{supported_groups, [x448,
 4120:                                                                        secp256r1,
 4121:                                                                        secp384r1]},
 4122:                                                    {cookie, Cookie}|ServerOpts]}]),
 4123:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4124:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4125: 					{host, Hostname},
 4126: 					{from, self()},
 4127: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
 4128: 
 4129:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send(Client, Data),
 4130:     Data = ssl_test_lib:check_active_receive(Server, Data),
 4131: 
 4132:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4133:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4134: 
 4135: start_client_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4136:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4137:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4138:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 4139:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4140: 					{host, Hostname},
 4141: 					{from, self()},
 4142:                                         {return_error, econnrefused},
 4143: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4144: 					{options, Options ++ ClientOpts}]),
 4145:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Client, {connect_failed, Error}]),
 4146:     {connect_failed, Error} = Client.
 4147: 
 4148: start_server_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4149:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4150:     {_, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4151:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4152: 					{from, self()},
 4153: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4154: 					{options,  Options ++ ServerOpts}]),
 4155: 
 4156:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Server,Error]),
 4157:     Error = Server.
 4158: 
 4159: der_input_opts(Opts) ->
 4160:     Certfile = proplists:get_value(certfile, Opts),
 4161:     CaCertsfile = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, Opts),
 4162:     Keyfile = proplists:get_value(keyfile, Opts),
 4163:     Dhfile = proplists:get_value(dhfile, Opts),
 4164:     [{_, Cert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Certfile),
 4165:     [{Asn1Type, Key, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Keyfile),
 4166:     [{_, DHParams, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Dhfile),
 4167:     CaCerts =
 4168: 	lists:map(fun(Entry) ->
 4169: 			  {_, CaCert, _} = Entry,
 4170: 			  CaCert
 4171: 		  end, ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CaCertsfile)),
 4172:     {Cert, {Asn1Type, Key}, CaCerts, DHParams}.
 4173: 
 4174: ssl_getstat(Socket) ->
 4175:     ssl:send(Socket, "From Erlang to Erlang"),
 4176:     {ok, Stats} = ssl:getstat(Socket),
 4177:     List = lists:dropwhile(fun({_, 0}) ->
 4178:                                    true;
 4179:                               ({_, _}) ->
 4180:                                    false
 4181:                            end, Stats),
 4182:     case List of
 4183:         [] ->
 4184:             nok;
 4185:         _  ->
 4186:             ok
 4187:     end.
 4188: 
 4189: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.3') ->
 4190:     {'tlsv1.2', ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']};
 4191: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.2') ->
 4192:     {'tlsv1.1', ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}.
 4193: 
 4194: protocol_version_check(Socket, Version) ->
 4195:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]) of
 4196:         {ok, [{protocol, Version}]} ->
 4197:             ok;
 4198:         Other ->
 4199:             ct:fail({expected, Version, got, Other})
 4200:     end.
 4201: 
 4202: log(#{msg:={report,_Report}},#{config:=Pid}) ->
 4203:     Pid ! warning_generated;
 4204: log(_,_) ->
 4205:     ok.
 4206: 
 4207: length_exclusive(Version) when ?TLS_1_X(Version) ->
 4208:     length(exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4209:         length(exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version));
 4210: length_exclusive(Version) when ?DTLS_1_X(Version)->
 4211:     length(dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4212:         length(dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version)).
 4213: 
 4214: length_all(Version) ->
 4215:     length(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version)).
 4216: 
 4217: exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4218:     lists:flatmap(fun (Vsn) -> ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn) end
 4219:                  , exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4220: 
 4221: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_3) -> [?TLS_1_3, ?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4222: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_2) -> [?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4223: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_1) -> [?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4224: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_0) -> [?TLS_1_0].
 4225: 
 4226: 
 4227: 
 4228: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4229:     lists:flatmap( fun (Vsn) -> ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn) end
 4230:                  , dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4231: 
 4232: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_2) -> [?DTLS_1_0, ?DTLS_1_2];
 4233: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_0) -> [?DTLS_1_0].
 4234: 
 4235: 
 4236: 
 4237: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4238:     lists:flatmap(fun exclusive_non_default_version/1
 4239:                  , exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4240: 
 4241: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_3) -> [?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4242: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_2) -> [?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4243: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_1) -> [?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4244: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_0) -> [?TLS_1_0].
 4245: 
 4246: 
 4247: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4248:     lists:flatmap( fun dtls_exclusive_non_default_version/1
 4249:                  , dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4250: 
 4251: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_2) -> [?DTLS_1_0, ?DTLS_1_2];
 4252: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_0) -> [?DTLS_1_0].
 4253: 
 4254: 
 4255: exclusive_non_default_version(Version) ->
 4256:     Ls = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4257:          , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4258:          , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4259:          , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1
 4260:          , fun tls_v1:rc4_exclusive/1],
 4261:     lists:flatmap(fun(Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Ls).
 4262: 
 4263: dtls_exclusive_non_default_version(DTLSVersion) ->        
 4264:     Version = ssl:tls_version(DTLSVersion),
 4265:     Fns = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4266:           , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4267:           , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4268:           , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1],
 4269:     lists:flatmap(fun (Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Fns).
 4270: 
 4271: selected_peer(ExpectedClient,
 4272:               ExpectedServer, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
 4273:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4274: 
 4275:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4276: 					{from, self()},
 4277:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedServer]}},
 4278:                                         {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ServerOpts, Config)}]),
 4279:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4280: 
 4281:     Client  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4282:                                          {host, Hostname},
 4283:                                          {from, self()},
 4284:                                          {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedClient]}},
 4285:                                          {options,  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ClientOpts, Config)}
 4286: 					]),
 4287: 
 4288:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 4289:     %% Make sure to start next test fresh
 4290:     ssl:stop(),
 4291:     ssl:start().
 4292: 
 4293: test_config('tlsv1.3', _) ->
 4294:     #{server_config := SEDDSAOpts,
 4295:       client_config := CEDDSAOpts} = eddsa_cert_chains(),
 4296:     #{server_config := SECDSAOpts,
 4297:       client_config := CECDSAOpts } = ecdsa_cert_chains(),
 4298: 
 4299:     {SEDDSACert, SEDDSAKey, SEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SEDDSAOpts),
 4300:     {CEDDSACert, CEDDSAKey, CEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CEDDSAOpts),
 4301: 
 4302:     {SECDSACert, SECDSAKey, SECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SECDSAOpts),
 4303:     {CECDSACert, CECDSAKey, CECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CECDSAOpts),
 4304: 
 4305:     ServerCertKeys = [#{cert => SECDSACert, key => SECDSAKey},
 4306:                       #{cert => SEDDSACert, key => SEDDSAKey}],
 4307: 
 4308:     ClientCertKeys = [#{cert => CECDSACert, key => CECDSAKey},
 4309:                       #{cert => CEDDSACert, key => CEDDSAKey}],
 4310: 
 4311:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys,ServerCertKeys},
 4312:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4313:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4314:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4315:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4316:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]
 4317:        },
 4318:       {client_peer, SEDDSACert}, {server_peer, CEDDSACert}},
 4319:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, ServerCertKeys},
 4320:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4321:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4322:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4323:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4324:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]},
 4325:       {client_peer, SECDSACert}, {server_peer, CECDSACert}}
 4326:     ];
 4327: test_config('tlsv1.2', _) ->
 4328:     #{server_config := SRSAOpts,
 4329:       client_config := CRSAOpts} = eddsa_cert_chains(),
 4330:     #{server_config := SDSAOpts,
 4331:       client_config := CDSAOpts} = dsa_cert_chains(),
 4332: 
 4333:     {SRSACert, SRSAKey, SRSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SRSAOpts),
 4334:     {CRSACert, CRSAKey, CRSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts,  CRSAOpts),
 4335: 
 4336:     {SDSACert, SDSAKey, SDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SDSAOpts),
 4337:     {CDSACert, CDSAKey, CDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts,  CDSAOpts),
 4338: 
 4339:     AllSigAlgs1_2 = ssl_test_lib:all_1_2_sig_algs(),
 4340: 
 4341:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys,
 4342:                            [#{cert => SDSACert, key => SDSAKey},
 4343:                             #{cert => SRSACert, key => SRSAKey}]},

 4345:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4346:                           {cacerts, SRSACACerts ++ SDSACACerts}],
 4347:         client_config => [{certs_keys,
 4348:                            [#{cert => CDSACert, key => CDSAKey},
 4349:                             #{cert => CRSACert, key => CRSAKey}]},
 4350:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4351:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4352:                           {cacerts, CRSACACerts ++ CDSACACerts}]
 4353:        },
 4354:       {client_peer, SRSACert}, {server_peer, CRSACert}},
 4355:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{cert => SDSACert, key => SDSAKey},
 4356:                                         #{cert => SRSACert, key => SRSAKey}]},
 4357:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4358:                           AllSigAlgs1_2,
 4359:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4360:                           {cacerts, SRSACACerts ++ SDSACACerts}],
 4361:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{cert => CDSACert, key => CDSAKey},
 4362:                                         #{cert => CRSACert, key => CRSAKey}]},
 4363:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4364:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4365:                           AllSigAlgs1_2,
 4366:                           {cacerts, CRSACACerts ++ CDSACACerts}]
 4367:        },
 4368:       {client_peer, SDSACert}, {server_peer, CDSACert}}];
 4369: test_config('dtlsv1.2', Config) ->
 4370:     #{server_config := SRSAPSSOpts,
 4371:       client_config := CRSAPSSOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_pss_pss, [], Config, "dtls_pss_pss_conf"),
 4372:     #{server_config := SRSAPSSRSAEOpts,
 4373:       client_config := CRSAPSSRSAEOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_pss_rsae, [], Config, "dtls_pss_rsae_conf"),
 4374: 
 4375:     {SRSAPSSCert, SRSAPSSKey, SRSAPSSCACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSAPSSOpts),
 4376:     {CRSAPSSCert, CRSAPSSKey, CRSAPSSCACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile,  CRSAPSSOpts),
 4377: 
 4378:     {SRSAPSSRSAECert, SRSAPSSRSAEKey, SRSAPSSRSAECACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSAPSSRSAEOpts),
 4379:     {CRSAPSSRSAECert, CRSAPSSRSAEKey, CRSAPSSRSAECACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSAPSSRSAEOpts),
 4380: 
 4381:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => SRSAPSSRSAEKey},
 4382:                                         #{certfile => SRSAPSSCert, keyfile => SRSAPSSKey}]},
 4383:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4384:                           {cacertfile, SRSAPSSCACerts}],
 4385:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => CRSAPSSRSAEKey},

 4390:        },

 4392:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => SRSAPSSRSAEKey},
 4393:                                         #{certfile => SRSAPSSCert, keyfile => SRSAPSSKey}]},
 4394:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4395:                           {cacertfile, SRSAPSSRSAECACerts}],
 4396:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => CRSAPSSRSAEKey}]},
 4397:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha256]},
 4398:                           {cacertfile, CRSAPSSRSAECACerts}]
 4399:        },

 4401:     ];
 4402: test_config(_, Config) ->
 4403:     RSAConf1 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config),
 4404:     SRSA1Opts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, RSAConf1),
 4405:     CRSA1Opts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, RSAConf1),
 4406: 
 4407:     RSAConf2 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config),
 4408:     SRSA2Opts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4409:     CRSA2Opts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4410: 
 4411:     {SRSA1Cert, SRSA1Key, _SRSA1CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSA1Opts),
 4412:     {CRSA1Cert, CRSA1Key, _CRSA1CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA1Opts),
 4413: 
 4414:     {SRSA2Cert, SRSA2Key, SRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSA2Opts),
 4415:     {CRSA2Cert, CRSA2Key, CRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA2Opts),
 4416: 
 4417:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSA2Cert, keyfile => SRSA2Key},
 4418:                                         #{certfile => SRSA1Cert, keyfile => SRSA1Key}]},
 4419:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4420:                           {cacertfile, SRSA2CACerts}],
 4421:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSA2Cert, keyfile  => CRSA2Key},
 4422:                                         #{certfile => CRSA1Cert, keyfile => CRSA1Key}]},
 4423:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4424:                           {cacertfile, CRSA2CACerts}]
 4425:        }, {client_peer,  pem_to_der_cert(SRSA2Cert)}, {server_peer, pem_to_der_cert(CRSA2Cert)}}].
 4426: 
 4427: check_peercert(Socket, Cert) ->
 4428:     case ssl:peercert(Socket) of
 4429:         {ok, Cert} ->
 4430:             ok;
 4431:         {ok, Other} ->
 4432:             {error, {{expected, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp)}, {got, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Other, otp)}}}
 4433:     end.
 4434: 
 4435: 
 4436: eddsa_cert_chains() ->
 4437:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4438:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4439:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
 4440:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4441:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4442:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}).
 4443: 
 4444: ecdsa_cert_chains() ->
 4445:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4446:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4447:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()},
 4448:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4449:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4450:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()}}).
 4451: dsa_cert_chains() ->
 4452:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}],
 4453:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4454:                                                   peer =>  [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}]
 4455:                                                  },
 4456:                                 client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}],
 4457:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4458:                                                   peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}]}}).
 4459: 
 4460: get_single_options(CertOptName, KeyOptName, CaOptName, Opts) ->
 4461:     CertOpt = proplists:get_value(CertOptName, Opts),
 4462:     KeyOpt = proplists:get_value(KeyOptName, Opts),
 4463:     CaOpt = proplists:get_value(CaOptName, Opts),
 4464:     {CertOpt, KeyOpt, CaOpt}.
 4465: 
 4466: pem_to_der_cert(Pem) ->
 4467:     [{'Certificate', Der, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Pem),
 4468:     Der.
 4469: 
 4470: test_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3'= Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) ->
 4471:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, ecdsa_sha1),
 4472:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, rsa_pkcs1_sha1);
 4473: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4474:                                                       Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4475:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, {sha, rsa}),
 4476:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, {sha, ecdsa});
 4477: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version,RSA,_,Config) ->
 4478:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, undefined).
 4479: 
 4480: run_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3', #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4481:     SigAlgs = [%% ECDSA
 4482:                ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 4483:                ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 4484:                ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 4485:                %% RSASSA-PSS
 4486:                rsa_pss_pss_sha512,
 4487:                rsa_pss_pss_sha384,
 4488:                rsa_pss_pss_sha256,
 4489:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,
 4490:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha384,
 4491:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
 4492:                %% EDDSA
 4493:                eddsa_ed25519,
 4494:                eddsa_ed448
 4495:               ],
 4496:     IncludeLegacyAlg =  SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4497:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  SigAlgs} | ClientOpts],
 4498:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config, handshake_failure),
 4499:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts],
 4500:                                     [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config);
 4501: 
 4502: run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4503:                                                                                                                  Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4504:     SigAlgs =  [%% SHA2
 4505:                 {sha512, ecdsa},
 4506:                 {sha512, rsa},
 4507:                 {sha384, ecdsa},
 4508:                 {sha384, rsa},
 4509:                 {sha256, ecdsa},
 4510:                 {sha256, rsa},
 4511:                 {sha224, ecdsa},
 4512:                 {sha224, rsa}],
 4513:     IncludeLegacyAlg = SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4514:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test( [{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts],
 4515:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config);
 4516: run_sha1_cert_conf(_, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4517:     NVersion = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 4518:     SigOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(LegacyAlg, NVersion),
 4519:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts] ++ SigOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 4520: 
 4521:
